attributes.action: Retain the opt out from the work time directive for British citizens
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The eu Work time directive will cause untold harm to the economy and essential services in the UK.  The eu wants to end our opt out with a majority vote of foreigners.

The UK should ignore the directive for all British citizens, and only apply it for european foreigners working in Britain.
